name: Shadow Split
description:
A lost relic lies within the ruin that is said to have unknown powers. The adventurer Jerel seeks to find answers about this mystical legend.

This Game was made for the Lost Relic Game Jam, and we hope everyone will enjoy this short adventure!

                                                             

Controls

WASD / ⮝ ⮜ ⮟ ⮞ = Move

E = Interaction

Escape = Pause

Credits

A Game by Crimson Alchemy

  • Ryan Beattie - Code
  • DhruvS28- Code
  • SoulWolfx - Art
  • Minibot Co. - Sound
